title: Bug 27455[JFace] Hyperlink colors all black
OB: PDE editors use platform UI settings for hyperlink colors. Since driver 1127(or maybe driver or two earlier, but this is where we noticed it), these colorsare all black. The actual colors shown in the preference page are correct (darkblue and blue for standard and active hyperlink colors), but the actual Colorobject we get from JFace colors has RGB 0,0,0.
